entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 1:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of freezing drizzle late this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
